title: Ruth Marries Boaz
description:
Readings from:
Ruth 4:9-17
Today's passages were read by Mike Peters. Mike is the pastor of Oasis International Church in Seville, Spain and has been married to his sweetheart Jen for 13 years. Together with their three sons Jack, Oliver and Henry, they have been living and ministering for the past 8 years in southern Spain. They are also in the process of adopting two little girls from the country of Liberia. Connect with Mike on Twitter @mike_peters84 and Facebook at Mike N Jen Peters.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
